derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'sauce for fish'): from Old French, alteration of galatine, from medieval Latin galatina; the current sense dates from the early 18th cent

means.word_mean: 1. boned poultry stuffed then cooked and covered with aspic; served cold
